artist: Designer: Peter Adams; Manufacturer: Book of Knowledge (Grolier, Inc.)
description: brick shape; top: boat (yellow and red) with 2 figures and whale (black with red mouth) on blue sea; figures move and whale's lower jaw moves--rest of box brown with 2 rows of holes on sides and ends; mouth is coin slot
inscription:
Inscriptions

on both sides, in gold: [JONAH AND THE WHALE]; on end, in gold: [BANK]; on bottom: [REPRODUCED FROM ORIGINAL IN COLLECTION OF / THE BOOK OF KNOWLEDGE / PAT. JULY 15 1890]; on stopper: [FATD FEB 2 1875]
title: "Jonah and the Whale" (reproduction, replaced boat) mechanical bank
